languages.text:
Cybermastiff permanently gains 5% dodge for each enemy and 5% parry for each ally in 2 cell radius.
Enemies with {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}Tagged{/g} counts as 3.

traits.locale_text:
Cybermastiff permanently gains 5% dodge for each enemy and 5% parry for each ally in 2 cell radius.
Enemies with {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}Tagged{/g} counts as 3.

languages.text:
The cyber-mastiff gains a +5% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for each enemy in a 2-cell radius and a +5% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} for each ally in a 2-cell radius. These bonuses stack and last until the end of combat.
Each {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}primary target{/g} counts as three.
languages.original_text:
Кибермастиф получает +5% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} за каждого противника в радиусе 2 клеток и +5% к {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g} за каждого союзника в радиусе 2 клеток. Эти бонусы суммируются и длятся до конца боя.
Для расчета каждая {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}основная цель{/g} считается за три.

languages.text:
Siber mastif; 2 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan her düşman için {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} değerine +%5 bonus, 2 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan her dost birim için ise {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} değerine +%5 bonus kazanır. Bu bonuslar üst üste birikebilir ve etkileri çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
Her {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}birincil hedef{/g}, üç olarak sayılır.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-mastiff gains a +5% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for each enemy in a 2-cell radius and a +5% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} for each ally in a 2-cell radius. These bonuses stack and last until the end of combat.
Each {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}primary target{/g} counts as three.

traits.locale_text:
Siber mastif; 2 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan her düşman için {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} değerine +%5 bonus, 2 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan her dost birim için ise {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} değerine +%5 bonus kazanır. Bu bonuslar üst üste birikebilir ve etkileri çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
Her {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}birincil hedef{/g}, üç olarak sayılır.

languages.text:
El cibermastín gana una bonificación de +5 % a la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} por cada enemigo que haya en un radio de 2 casillas, y una bonificación de +5 % a la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} por cada aliado que haya en un radio de 2 casillas. Estas bonificaciones son acumulativas y duran hasta el final del combate.
Cada {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}objetivo principal{/g} cuenta por tres.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-mastiff gains a +5% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for each enemy in a 2-cell radius and a +5% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} for each ally in a 2-cell radius. These bonuses stack and last until the end of combat.
Each {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}primary target{/g} counts as three.

traits.locale_text:
El cibermastín gana una bonificación de +5 % a la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} por cada enemigo que haya en un radio de 2 casillas, y una bonificación de +5 % a la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} por cada aliado que haya en un radio de 2 casillas. Estas bonificaciones son acumulativas y duran hasta el final del combate.
Cada {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}objetivo principal{/g} cuenta por tres.

languages.text:
生化獒犬距离2格以内每有一名敌人，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}就提高5%，距离2格以内每有一名盟友，{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}就提高5%。上述加成效果可叠加，效果持续至战斗结束。
每个{g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}主要目标{/g}视为3名敌人。
languages.original_text:
The cyber-mastiff gains a +5% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for each enemy in a 2-cell radius and a +5% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} for each ally in a 2-cell radius. These bonuses stack and last until the end of combat.
Each {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}primary target{/g} counts as three.

traits.locale_text:
生化獒犬距离2格以内每有一名敌人，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}就提高5%，距离2格以内每有一名盟友，{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}就提高5%。上述加成效果可叠加，效果持续至战斗结束。
每个{g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}主要目标{/g}视为3名敌人。

languages.text:
Le cyber-mastiff gagne un bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Esquive{/g} de +5 % par ennemi dans un rayon de 2 cases et un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} de +5 % par allié dans un rayon de 2 cellules. Ces bonus sont cumulables et durent jusqu'à la fin du combat.
Chaque {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}cible principale{/g} compte comme trois cibles.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-mastiff gains a +5% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for each enemy in a 2-cell radius and a +5% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} for each ally in a 2-cell radius. These bonuses stack and last until the end of combat.
Each {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}primary target{/g} counts as three.

traits.locale_text:
Le cyber-mastiff gagne un bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Esquive{/g} de +5 % par ennemi dans un rayon de 2 cases et un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} de +5 % par allié dans un rayon de 2 cellules. Ces bonus sont cumulables et durent jusqu'à la fin du combat.
Chaque {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}cible principale{/g} compte comme trois cibles.

languages.text:
サイバーマスチフは、周囲2セルの敵につき+5%の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}ボーナスを付与され、周囲2セルの味方につき+5%の{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}ボーナスを付与される。このボーナスはスタックし、戦闘終了時まで継続する。
各{g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}メインターゲット{/g}は3としてカウントする。
languages.original_text:
The cyber-mastiff gains a +5% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for each enemy in a 2-cell radius and a +5% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} for each ally in a 2-cell radius. These bonuses stack and last until the end of combat.
Each {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}primary target{/g} counts as three.

traits.locale_text:
サイバーマスチフは、周囲2セルの敵につき+5%の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}ボーナスを付与され、周囲2セルの味方につき+5%の{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}ボーナスを付与される。このボーナスはスタックし、戦闘終了時まで継続する。
各{g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}メインターゲット{/g}は3としてカウントする。

languages.text: Der Cyber-Mastiff erhält einen Bonus von +5 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} für jeden Gegner in einem Radius von 2 Feldern und einen Bonus von +5 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} für jeden Verbündeten in einem Radius von 2 Feldern. Diese Boni sind kumulativ und haben bis zum Ende des Kampfs Bestand. Jedes {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}Primärziel{/g} zählt dreifach.

Each {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}primary target{/g} counts as three.

traits.locale_text: Der Cyber-Mastiff erhält einen Bonus von +5 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} für jeden Gegner in einem Radius von 2 Feldern und einen Bonus von +5 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} für jeden Verbündeten in einem Radius von 2 Feldern. Diese Boni sind kumulativ und haben bis zum Ende des Kampfs Bestand.Jedes {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}Primärziel{/g} zählt dreifach.
